DOC.brief_summary: The goal research study learn home-based physical activity program feasible help endometrial cancer survivor lose weight .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility NEXT Steps Weight Loss Intervention +/- Resistance Training Endometrial Cancer Survivors : Effect Lean Mass & Biomarkers
DOC.detailed_description: Baseline Visit : If participant find eligible take part study , accelerometer mail . An accelerometer small device record participant 's activity level participant wear waist day . Participant wear accelerometer 7 day baseline visit . Participant bring accelerometer baseline visit . Participant also complete 8 questionnaire demographic information ( age , race , sex , ) / health treatment history , current physical activity , quality life , well function physically , sexual function , fatigue , body image , safety well brief survey exercise nutrition preference . It take 2 hour complete questionnaire brief survey . Participant also complete 3 questionnaire online ate last 24 hour . Two ( 2 ) complete weekdays weekend day . They take 45 minute complete . The link questionnaires email participant . At baseline visit MD Anderson : - Participant 's height , weight , blood pressure , waist hip circumference measure . - Blood ( 1½ tablespoon ) draw participant fast ( nothing eat drink water ) 8 hour . These sample store future biomarker test . Biomarkers give information inflammation , breakdown food energy , molecule release fat cell . This information help see change participant 's metabolism inflammation level throughout study . - Participant dual energy x-ray absorptiometry ( DEXA ) scan check amount muscle body . - Participant 's fitness check use 6-minute walk test see far walk 6 minute . Participant also see many arm curl 30-seconds , many time stand sit position 30-seconds , fast get chair walk 8 foot . Study Groups : After baseline , participant randomly assign ( roll dice ) 1 3 study group . Participant equal chance group . - If participant Group 1 , exercise plan focus physical activity resistance training . - If participant Group 2 , exercise plan focus physical activity . - If participant Group 3 , receive standard care , phone call ask health self-help material . Study Procedures : Both Groups 1 2 : - Participant receive portion control plate use least 1 time day plan meal . - Participant receive personalize workbook physical activity guideline . - Participant give Fitbit ( measure activity level ) wireless scale . The information scale Fitbit send Fitbit website participant monitor activity level . Participant keep Fitbit study , must return scale . - Participant also loan iPad mini one . This used video chat use FaceTime research team . - Participant call 4 time first month , 2 time second month , 1 time per month rest study . Participant also receive follow-up call end study . These call occur use telephone video chat use FaceTime iPad . The call take 15-30 minute . Participant ask feedback reach goal , give tip success , help make plan remove barrier physical activity . - Participant receive around 7 text message per week . Text message include feedback , support , information diet exercise . Text message also ask participant report often use portion plate many serving fruit vegetable eat day . - Participant tell aerobic exercise ( walk swim ) 30-60 minute least 5 day week . The amount exercise slowly increase 6 month . Group 1 : If participant Group 1 , also use resistance exercise 15-30 minute least 2 time week . Participant give resistance band , exercise handout , access video PDF contain training video . Participant use iPad mini video chat research team member twice month 1 month 3 . Sessions take 30 60 minute make sure participant exercise correctly question answer . Participant need return loaned iPad mini study . Participant able use iPad iPad mini would like electronic access necessary program videos . Group 3 : If participant Group 3 , call 4 time first month , 2 time second month , 1 time month remain 4 month . Additionally , participant receive follow-up call end study . Participant also receive self-help material 4 time point . Participants group receive Fitbit , wifi scale , portion plate , iPad mini . Study Visits : At 3 month , participant send link 8 questionnaire physical activity , safety , satisfaction , quality life , physical functioning , sexual function , body image fatigue well brief survey . Participant complete online take 1½ hour complete . At 6 month participant return MD Anderson : - Participant complete 9 online questionnaire physical activity , diet , quality life , satisfaction , safety , sexual function , fatigue , body image ability function physically . It take 3 hour complete . - Participant 's height , weight , blood pressure waist circumference measure . - Blood ( 1½ tablespoon ) draw participant fast 8 hour . These sample store biomarker test list . - Participant DEXA scan . - Participant repeat fitness test baseline visit include 6-minute walk test , 30-second arm curl , 30-second sit-to-stand test , test see fast get chair walk 8 foot . The accelerometer mail back participant 6 month visit . Participant instruct wear 7 day , follow instruction give first 7 day . Length Study : Study participation participant complete 6 month visit . Participant 's study participation may stop early become injured , become ineligible ( example , need treatment ) , research staff think best interest . This investigational study . Up 75 participant take part study . All enrol MD Anderson .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Diagnosed Stage III endometrial cancer 2 . Six 36 month post treatment 3 . Body mass index ( BMI ) 30 < 45 kg/m2 4 . Age least 18 year 5 . Access telephone coaching session access computer , smartphone , tablet sync Fitbit device 6 . Can speak read English 7 . Can provide informed consent 8 . Willing travel MD Anderson 's main campus 2 visit ( baseline 6 month postbaseline ) 1 . Unmanaged lymphedema 2 . Medical contraindication homebased exercise lowfat , high fruit vegetable diet 3 . Functional limitation require walker/scooter/wheelchair daily activity 4 . Recurrent disease 5 . Vigorous exercise > = 60 min/week moderate exercise > = 150 min/week . If combination moderate vigorous exercise preform , minute moderate exercise/week plus 2 x minute vigorous exercise/week > = 150 min/week . 6 . Resistance training > = 2 days/week accounting 30 minute strength training per week 7 . Enrollment structure weight loss program past 6 month
